thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 14
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 14 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 14
text:
Aug 4 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** TUESDAY, AUGUST 4 BUCHAREST - Central bank of Romania holds interest rate meeting - 0800 GMT. MUMBAI - Reserve Bank of India holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary non-rate-setting meeting. WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 5 BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand holds Monetary Policy Committee meeting - 0730 GMT. NAIROBI - Central bank of Kenya holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary will publish the minutes of July policy meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. The bank will also update its quarterly macroeconomic forecast.
SUNDAY, AUGUST 9 KAMPALA - Central bank of Uganda announces interest rate decision - 2200 GMT.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 11 LUSAKA - Bank of Zambia announces interest rate decision - 0600 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 12 MEXICO CITY - Central bank of Mexico publishes quarterly inflation report. THURSDAY, AUGUST 13 SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting - 0100 GMT. MANILA - Central Bank of Philippines holds Monetary Policy Meeting - 0800 GMT. BELGRADE - National bank of Serbia holds executive board meeting to announce interest rates - 1000 GMT. MEXICO CITY - Central bank of Mexico will publish the minutes of July policy meeting - 1400 GMT.
FRIDAY, AUGUST 14 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank to publish minutes of August policy meeting - 0700 GMT.
